title: Fighter Pilot Readiness Assessment
description: A squadron commander needs to ensure all pilots are current on their training and certifications before a major exercise.

tasks.description: Query the pilot training records database for all pilots in the squadron.
tasks.expected_outcome: Commander retrieves the complete training history for every pilot.

tasks.description: Identify any pilots whose certifications are expired or close to expiring (e.g., night flying, aerial refueling).
tasks.expected_outcome: Commander generates an accurate list of pilots with training deficiencies.

tasks.description: Schedule the necessary simulator sessions or training flights to get all pilots fully certified.
tasks.expected_outcome: Commander creates a schedule to resolve all training issues before the exercise.
